text: Overall I am very satisfied with Synergy's service this year. The billing statements arrive on time and are easy to understand. When I had a question, the customer service team responded quickly and clearly. I appreciate the changes to the online portal which make checking usage simple. The outage history has been minimal and communications during any brief interruption have been clear and reassuring.

My experience with the billing process has been mostly straightforward, with a few items that required extra attention. I can follow the charges, but there are moments when I wish the notes on the bill were a bit clearer. The support I received when I asked about a charge was adequate, though not particularly remarkable. I found the self-service options in the portal decent, but I expected a smoother navigation. Overall, the service feels dependable, but there are minor annoyances I hope you address.

I am impressed with how quickly the app information is updated and how easy it is to monitor my usage. The mobile experience is smooth and intuitive, making it simple to review charges on the go. Customer service communication during a recent question was friendly and professional. Prices remain fair relative to the service quality, and I feel informed about any changes. Overall, the reliability of the electricity supply and the helpful digital tools have kept me satisfied.

We experienced a longer outage last month, and the impact on our daily routine was more disruptive than I expected. The restoration time seemed slow and I had to call multiple times to get updates. I was frustrated by inconsistent information about when power would return and by the lack of proactive alerts. Billing adjustments for the outage were confusing and took longer than promised. I hope the utility improves outage communication and restoration timelines in the future.

I recently reviewed my bill and was pleased with how clearly it itemizes usage and charges. The due dates are easy to track and there are flexible payment options that reduce stress. Customer service helped me understand a credit from a prior cycle without any hassle. The portal upgrades have made checking energy use more engaging and informative. Overall, the billing experience feels transparent and customer-focused.

The app generally works fine, and I can access most features without issues. Sometimes the layout makes it a bit harder to find specific settings, but the core functions are usable. The information on pricing changes is presented, though some details require digging for context. I appreciate that you provide explanations alongside bills when questions arise. In general, the service remains reliable and predictable.

We faced another outage that lasted longer than expected, which disrupted work and home routines. The outage notices arrived late, and I had to search for updates rather than being informed automatically. The crew interruptions during the repair were not consistently communicated, which added frustration. Billing for the outage period felt unfair and required additional follow-up. I hope response times and notifications improve during future outages.

The app experience has been frustrating lately due to slow loading times and occasional login errors. Navigating to detailed usage peaks is not as intuitive as it should be, which makes budgeting harder. Customer support was helpful when I called, but the app issues persist across devices. I have seen some improvements, yet there are still reliability gaps that affect daily planning. I am disappointed that app usability remains a problem for a service I rely on.

My account appreciates the consistency in service and the price structure feels reasonable for the value provided. I would like to see more transparent explanations of how seasonal rate changes are applied. The billing summary is generally clear, and the payment process is straightforward. Customer support responses are timely, even if some information could be more detailed. Overall, the experience with pricing and service is steady, not exciting, but dependable.

I am unhappy with several billing charges that appeared this month and required corrections. The explanation of these fees was vague and the recalculation took longer than promised. My interactions with support were not as efficient as I expected, leaving me frustrated. The delays in resolving billing disputes have eroded trust in the process. I hope the billing system becomes more transparent and accurate in the near future.
